text:
Subscribe to Highsnobiety on YouTube 
Paramount has released a new Ghost in the Shell teaser ahead of next week’s highly-anticipated theatrical release. 
As each clip is released, we get a better understanding of the Ghost in the Shell world. We’ve already seen Scarlett Johansson, aka The Major — a human-cyborg hybrid who is in charge of Section 9, an elite cybercrime-fighting task force — kick ass in a multitude of ways. 
In this short clip, we see The Major’s camouflage technology put into use in a crazy water fight scene. We’ve seen snippets of this scene twice before, but this is the first time the full length version has been released — and it’s been worth the wait. 
Kicking ass aside, Ghost in the Shell has already come under a lot of criticism — with many arguing that casting Scarlett Johansson in the lead role is racist and a prime example of Hollywood’s whitewashing . 
Watch the fight scene above then check out the films other trailers and teasers below. Ghost in the Shell arrives in theaters next Friday, March 31.
